channel.title: Docker Swarm on Lucas Roesler
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Swarm on Lucas Roesler

item.title: Deploying a private registry in Docker Swarm
item.description: At Contiamo I am currently working a project that will eventually integrate with OpenFaaS. I am really excited about this project because we will soon bring some serverless magic to data scientists that use Contiamo. That is, once I figure out how to deploy a private Docker registry inside a Docker Swarm.
